name: py-gradio

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Python library for easily interacting with trained machine learning
models

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-hatchling
dependencies.description: Modern, extensible Python build backend.

dependencies.name: py-hatch-requirements-txt
dependencies.description: Hatchling plugin to read project dependencies from requirements.txt

dependencies.name: py-hatch-fancy-pypi-readme
dependencies.description: Fancy PyPI READMEs with Hatch.

dependencies.name: py-aiofiles
dependencies.description:
aiofiles is an Apache2 licensed library, written in Python, for handling
local disk files in asyncio applications.

dependencies.name: py-aiohttp
dependencies.description:
Supports both client and server side of HTTP protocol. Supports both
client and server Web-Sockets out-of-the-box and avoids Callbacks.
Provides Web-server with middlewares and plugable routing.

dependencies.name: py-altair
dependencies.description: Declarative statistical visualization library for Python

dependencies.name: py-fastapi
dependencies.description:
FastAPI framework, high performance, easy to learn, fast to code, ready
for production

dependencies.name: py-ffmpy
dependencies.description: A simple Python wrapper for ffmpeg

dependencies.name: py-gradio-client
dependencies.description:
Python library for easily interacting with trained machine learning
models

dependencies.name: py-httpx
dependencies.description:
HTTPX is a fully featured HTTP client for Python 3, which provides sync
and async APIs, and support for both HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2.

dependencies.name: py-huggingface-hub
dependencies.description:
This library allows anyone to work with the Hub repositories: you can
clone them, create them and upload your models to them.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-markdown-it-py
dependencies.description:
Markdown parser, done right. 100% CommonMark support, extensions, syntax
plugins & high speed

dependencies.name: py-pygments
dependencies.description: Pygments is a syntax highlighting package written in Python.

dependencies.name: py-mdit-py-plugins
dependencies.description: Collection of core plugins for markdown-it-py

dependencies.name: py-markupsafe
dependencies.description:
MarkupSafe is a library for Python that implements a unicode string that
is aware of HTML escaping rules and can be used to implement automatic
string escaping. It is used by Jinja 2, the Mako templating engine, the
Pylons web framework and many more.

dependencies.name: py-matplotlib
dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-orjson
dependencies.description:
Fast, correct Python JSON library supporting dataclasses, datetimes, and
numpy.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: pil
dependencies.description:
Pillow-SIMD is a SIMD-enabled fork of Pillow. It is usually 4-6x faster
than the original Pillow in image processing benchmarks.

dependencies.name: py-pydantic
dependencies.description: Data validation and settings management using Python type hinting.

dependencies.name: py-python-multipart
dependencies.description: A streaming multipart parser for Python

dependencies.name: py-pydub
dependencies.description: Manipulate audio with an simple and easy high level interface

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-semantic-version
dependencies.description:
This small python library provides a few tools to handle SemVer in
Python. It follows strictly the 2.0.0 version of the SemVer scheme.

dependencies.name: py-uvicorn
dependencies.description: The lightning-fast ASGI server.

dependencies.name: py-websockets
dependencies.description:
websockets is a library for building WebSocket servers and clients in
Python with a focus on correctness and simplicity.
